sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose that \(a : p = b : q \). Then show that 
\[
	\frac{a ^2 + p ^2}{a + p } + \frac{b ^2 + q ^2}{b + q } = \frac{(a + b )^2 + (p + q )^2}{(a + b ) + (p + q )}
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	\frac{a }{p } = \frac{b }{q } = s \textrm{ assume}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow a = \input[s1v1]{}s , b = q\input[s1v2]{}
\]
"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Left hand side expression of the equation can be written as
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \frac{a ^2 + p ^2}{a + p } + \frac{b ^2 + q ^2}{b + q }
\]
\[
	= \frac{p ^2 s ^2 + \input[s2v1]{} ^2}{ps + p } + \frac{\input[s2v2]{} ^2 s ^2 + q ^2}{qs + q } 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{\input[s3v1]{} + 1}{s + 1} p + \frac{\input[s3v1]{} ^2 + 1}{s + 1} q 
\]
\[
	= \frac{s ^2 + 1}{s + 1} (p + q )
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now right hand side expression of the given equation is
\[
	\textrm{RHS } = \frac{(p\input[s4v1]{} + qs )^2 + (p + q )^2}{(ps + \input[s4v2]{}s ) + (p + q )}
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	= \frac{(\input[s5v1]{} ^2 + 1)(p + \input[s5v2]{} )^2}{(s + 1)(p + q )}
\]
\[
	= \frac{s ^2 + 1}{s + 1} (p + q )
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
From the above two expressions we can clearly observe that
\[
	\textrm{LHS } = \textrm{ RHS}
\]
Hence proved.
\newline
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["p", "s"], "text": "$$\text{After assumption $\frac{a }{p } = \frac{b }{q} = s$ and taking terms separately we get $a = ps , b = qs$}$$"}, {"data": ["p", "q"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking the expression, and substituting the value of $a$ and $b$ in the LHS, we get $\frac{p ^2 s ^2 + p ^2}{ps + p } + \frac{q ^2 s ^2 + q ^2}{qs + q}$}$$"}, {"data": ["s", "s"], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification we get $\frac{s ^2 + 1}{s + 1} (p + q )$}$$"}, {"data": ["s", "q"], "text": "$$\text{Putting the values of $a$ and $b$ in RHS, we get $\frac{(ps + qs )^2 + (p + q )^2}{(ps + qs ) + (p + q)}$}$$"}, {"data": ["s", "q"], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification of the previous equation we get $\frac{s ^2 + 1}{s + 1} (p + q )$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
